Blog.post: hey guyz.....I broke up with the guy I was with...the one in florida who never called me. anywayz... I am now with one of my best friends...Joe. apparently he's liked me for like forever and I never knew it...I can't believe I was so blind. He is so sweet! The whole time I was with mickey he was so unbelievably supportive of me...even though he liked me. He keeps telling me I'm beautiful. We kinda have a song...it is "Nothing on but the radio" by Gary Alan. It is great. If you know me...you know that, for the first time in a long time, i'm truly happy...and that makes me happy. he is so...so...yummy!...i can't believe i never thought about Joe this way. He is so cute and so funny and so loving and so honest and truthful and caring and did i say cute and loving! i'm so mad at myself for waiting this long to see this... and i am so happy now that i have his love!...I can actually sleep again....wow...i'm gonna go play that sleep game!...cause i can...i sleep really well!...i'm happy!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

yeah ...so it's tuesday and so far he hasn't called me yet. but guess who texted me...dallas....if you don't know he is an old flame....grrr...i really wish mi novio would hurry up....estoy aqui, muriendo por dentro y el me dijiste que el aqui en la ocho y el no aqui...yo muy errecha con el...pero...oh well...if he doesn't call me tonight i'm gonna be fucking pissed!

son uf a fuckin bitch...we didn't break the fucking gator and grampa needs to get the fuck over it...if you break a radiator you will fucking know it...so we can't ride the gator cause we rode it through the pasture and broke the radiator...oh fuck off!

yeah so ...whats up?....uhm...yesterday was the 8th...and guess who never showed up...and who hasn't called me since last tuesday...yep that would be mi novio. Goddamn it! i wish i knew what the fuck was going on. i trust him implicitly...but i don't know if he was really trying to make it and it didn't work out...oor if he just lied to me...but...ya know...if it's not gonna work out...he coulda let a sister know...he's supposedly driving an 18-wheeler in texas at the moment...but ya know...if he had promised me he'd be here on the 8th and he wasn't gonna make it...even if he doesn't have his cell phone anymore...every fucking corner store has a damn payphone!...but...ya know ...i guess i'll get over it...i don't have any other choice....well i'll c ya'll later.
all three of these were posted on thursday august 5...dunno whats up with my date thingy...sorry.

hey guys...there have been some things that are really ticking me off recently... like...i wrecked my car a month ago and it still isn't fricking fixed!!!!!!...my boyfriend is out of town until january...and i have to take a driving class and go listen to some guy for ramble on about driving for like six hours! I ask you... how i the fuck is listeneing to some dude ramble on and on gonna help me to see someone who is high, doesn't have his lights on and is in my blindspot any fucking better?!?!?!?...un-B-fucking-lieveable!!!!!!!...woof....sorry...i'm mad at the system....anywayz....gonna go hang with my bro jeremy...c ya'll later.

Howdy, anyone who is insane enough to want to know what runs through my head! My name is keely and I shall be your blogger for today. I do ask that you remain seated,and keep your horsebacks and coffee-tables in their upright and locked position until exiting this page. Thank you for your cooperation (please feel free to be a non-conformist and ride your horse backwards. I won't yell at you unless you start smoking). This shall be the end of my first bloggy thingy and there shall be more random spiffy-ness to come thanx!

at the moment i am very tired and dad wants the computer...but i wanted to drop a line and say hey...i dunno if anyone will actually read any of this crap...but if you...feedback would be appreciated...i will try to make my posts humorous...and such...but please realize that i'm not all about jokes...i actually have something to say every once in a while...at the moment i'm gonna go study the light permeating the membranes of my eyelids to learn the meaning of life....any wayz...c ya'll (if you are in fact a ya'll?!?)

I AM SO FUCKING TIRED OF CLEANING THE FUCKING HOUSE! IT IS REALLY PISSING ME OFF!...I GET THE HOUSE LOOKING REALLY GOOD...DAD WALKS IN RUNS HIS HAND OVER A SHELF THAT IS LIKE 8 FUCKING FEET ABOVE MY HEAD AND SAY I HAVE TO DUST IT...WTF?!?!?! THIS IS SHIT I FUCKING HATE IT. BUT IF I DON'T DO IT I GET GROUNDED AND THAT IS ASS....WOOF IN GENERAL...WISH THIS DAMN SUMMER WOULD HURRY UP AND END...IT HAS BEEN ASS!

i just had the funniest thought ever....i was sitting here eating pudding...and my friend asked me what i was eating i said poo-ding...and i all of a sudden got this image of a monkey throwing poo at a gong and he goes poo and it goes ding!...it was great!
